doc.title: Corbett and Courtney Before the Kinetograph
doc.plot: 'James J. Corbett' (qv) and 'Peter Courtney' (qv) meet in a boxing exhibition, with special conditions that will allow the 'Thomas Edison' (qv) Company to film the match and show it on their Kinetograph. The match consists of six one-minute rounds. The popular 'James J. Corbett' (qv) had earlier defeated the great John L. Sullivan and must be considered a heavy favourite. But, at least for a while, 'Peter Courtney' (qv) seems to be holding his own.
